page.title: 13STREET LANE,RIPLEY.
page.content: On Street Lane there are four farms.Iron Works Farm,Strelley Court Farm Morley Park Farm and Sandown Farm.On Iron Works Farm there is also a caravan site.Strelly Court Farm is disused and we had a look at it.There was some machinery in some of the buildings.Most of the land round Street Lane is used for farming.The road called Street Lane was built by the Romans.It is Hundreds of years old.Now a days people live on it ,play on it and drive their cars on it.The fields by Street Lane are going to be outcropped by digging for coal.The A38 is the biggest road on our map.We went through some roads and came to a sort of dead end where we rested and a fox crossed the path.No one saw the fox but everyone smelt it.We did pass some barley,wheat and mowing grass(for silage or hay).
